review.title: “Trying Hard”
review.pros: Pros – Good foundation, good employees, right employee attitude.Great industry and working environment. Hours are flexible (shifts), and a great "team attitude".Good place to train, qualify and move on to better things...
review.cons: Cons – Pay soso. Not a lot of business, but enough not to get too bored. Management has changed, and the client base went with the original owners.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Do some marketing and get business in.
